org.eclipselabs.emongo

Interface MongoProvider


  • public interface MongoProvider
    This OSGi service provides access to a configured MongoDB driver. The MongoDB driver is initialized using the configured service properties.
    Author:
    bhunt

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String PID 
      static java.lang.String PROP_ALWAYS_USE_MBEANS
      The service property key for: Sets whether JMX beans registered by the driver should always be MBeans, regardless of whether the VM is Java 6 or greater.
      static java.lang.String PROP_CLIENT_ID
      The service property key for the client id.
      static java.lang.String PROP_CONNECT_TIMEOUT
      The service property key for: The connection timeout in milliseconds.
      static java.lang.String PROP_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOST
      The service property key for: The maximum number of connections allowed per host for this Mongo instance.
      static java.lang.String PROP_CURSOR_FINALIZER_ENABLED
      The service property key for: Sets whether cursor finalizers are enabled.
      static java.lang.String PROP_DESCRIPTION
      The service property key for: The description for Mongo instances created with these options.
      static java.lang.String PROP_FSYNC
      The service property key for: The 'fsync' value of the global WriteConcern.
      static java.lang.String PROP_HEARTBEAT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT
      The service property key for: Sets the connect timeout for connections used for the cluster heartbeat.
      static java.lang.String PROP_HEARTBEAT_FREQUENCY
      The service property key for: Sets the heartbeat frequency.

      The service property key for: Sets the socket timeout for connections used for the cluster heartbeat.

      The service property key for: Sets the maximum idle time for a pooled connection.

      The service property key for: Sets the maximum life time for a pooled connection.

      The service property key for: The maximum wait time in ms that a thread may wait for a connection to become available.

      The service property key for: The read preference tags.
      static java.lang.String PROP_READ_PREFERENCE_TYPE
      The service property key for: The read preference type.
      static java.lang.String PROP_SERVER_SELECTION_TIMEOUT
      The service property key for: Sets the server selection timeout in milliseconds, which defines how long the driver will wait for server selection to succeed before throwing an exception.
      static java.lang.String PROP_SOCKET_KEEP_ALIVE
      The service property key for: This flag controls the socket keep alive feature that keeps a connection alive through firewalls Socket.setKeepAlive(boolean) Default is false.
      static java.lang.String PROP_SOCKET_TIMEOUT
      The service property key for: The socket timeout in milliseconds It is used for I/O socket read and write operations Socket.setSoTimeout(int) Default is 0 and means no timeout.
      static java.lang.String PROP_SSL_ENABLED
      The service property key for: Sets whether to use SSL.
      static java.lang.String PROP_SSL_INVALID_HOST_NAME_ALLOWED
      The service property key for: Define whether invalid host names should be allowed.

      The service property key for: This multiplier, multiplied with the connectionsPerHost setting, gives the maximum number of threads that may be waiting for a connection to become available from the pool.

      The service property key for the client URI.

      The service property key for: The 'w' value of the global WriteConcern.
      static java.lang.String PROP_WTIMEOUT
      The service property key for: The 'wtimeout' value of the global WriteConcern.

    • Field Detail

      • PID

        static final java.lang.String PID
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_URI

        static final java.lang.String PROP_URI
        The service property key for the client URI. The value may be a single URI for one MongoDB server, or a CSV of URIs for a MongoDB replica set. The value must have the form: mongodb://host[:port] [,mongodb://host[:port]] You may optionally specify a user, password, and database in which case, the URI would have the form: user:password@mongodb://host[:port]/database [,user:password@mongodb://host[:port]/database]
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_CLIENT_ID

        static final java.lang.String PROP_CLIENT_ID
        The service property key for the client id. The value must be unique to an OSGi application instance.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_ALWAYS_USE_MBEANS

        static final java.lang.String PROP_ALWAYS_USE_MBEANS
        The service property key for: Sets whether JMX beans registered by the driver should always be MBeans, regardless of whether the VM is Java 6 or greater.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOST

        static final java.lang.String PROP_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOST
        The service property key for: The maximum number of connections allowed per host for this Mongo instance. Those connections will be kept in a pool when idle. Once the pool is exhausted, any operation requiring a connection will block waiting for an available connection. Default is 100.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_CONNECT_TIMEOUT

        static final java.lang.String PROP_CONNECT_TIMEOUT
        The service property key for: The connection timeout in milliseconds. It is used solely when establishing a new connection Socket.connect(java.net.SocketAddress, int) Default is 0 and means no timeout.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_CURSOR_FINALIZER_ENABLED

        static final java.lang.String PROP_CURSOR_FINALIZER_ENABLED
        The service property key for: Sets whether cursor finalizers are enabled.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_DESCRIPTION

        static final java.lang.String PROP_DESCRIPTION
        The service property key for: The description for Mongo instances created with these options. This is used in various places like logging.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_HEARTBEAT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT

        static final java.lang.String PROP_HEARTBEAT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT
        The service property key for: Sets the connect timeout for connections used for the cluster heartbeat.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_MAX_WAIT_TIME

        static final java.lang.String PROP_MAX_WAIT_TIME
        The service property key for: The maximum wait time in ms that a thread may wait for a connection to become available. Default is 120,000.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_SERVER_SELECTION_TIMEOUT

        static final java.lang.String PROP_SERVER_SELECTION_TIMEOUT
        The service property key for: Sets the server selection timeout in milliseconds, which defines how long the driver will wait for server selection to succeed before throwing an exception.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_SOCKET_KEEP_ALIVE

        static final java.lang.String PROP_SOCKET_KEEP_ALIVE
        The service property key for: This flag controls the socket keep alive feature that keeps a connection alive through firewalls Socket.setKeepAlive(boolean) Default is false.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_SOCKET_TIMEOUT

        static final java.lang.String PROP_SOCKET_TIMEOUT
        The service property key for: The socket timeout in milliseconds It is used for I/O socket read and write operations Socket.setSoTimeout(int) Default is 0 and means no timeout.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_SSL_ENABLED

        static final java.lang.String PROP_SSL_ENABLED
        The service property key for: Sets whether to use SSL.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_SSL_INVALID_HOST_NAME_ALLOWED

        static final java.lang.String PROP_SSL_INVALID_HOST_NAME_ALLOWED
        The service property key for: Define whether invalid host names should be allowed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_THREADS_ALLOWED_TO_BLOCK_FOR_CONNECTION_MULTIPLIER

        static final java.lang.String PROP_THREADS_ALLOWED_TO_BLOCK_FOR_CONNECTION_MULTIPLIER
        The service property key for: This multiplier, multiplied with the connectionsPerHost setting, gives the maximum number of threads that may be waiting for a connection to become available from the pool. All further threads will get an exception right away. For example if connectionsPerHost is 10 and threadsAllowedToBlockForConnectionMultiplier is 5, then up to 50 threads can wait for a connection. Default is 5.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_W

        static final java.lang.String PROP_W
        The service property key for: The 'w' value of the global WriteConcern. Default is 0.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_WTIMEOUT

        static final java.lang.String PROP_WTIMEOUT
        The service property key for: The 'wtimeout' value of the global WriteConcern. Default is 0.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_FSYNC

        static final java.lang.String PROP_FSYNC
        The service property key for: The 'fsync' value of the global WriteConcern. Default is false.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_J

        static final java.lang.String PROP_J
        The service property key for: The 'j' value of the global WriteConcern. Default is false.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getMongoClient

        com.mongodb.MongoClient getMongoClient()
        Returns:
        the MongoDB client driver configured by the service properties

      • getMongoDatabase

        com.mongodb.client.MongoDatabase getMongoDatabase()
        Returns:
        the MongoDB database configured by the service properties

      • getURIs

        java.lang.String[] getURIs()
        Returns:
        list of URIs configured on the client. A single URI will be returned for a single MongoDB. Multiple URIs will be returned for a replica set.

      • getClientId

        java.lang.String getClientId()
        Returns:
        the unique client id configured by the service properties
